rules_text:
{2}{U}{U}: Diverge 1/1 [i](If this creature isn’t a Mutant, its base power and toughness become 1/1 and it becomes a Mutant in addition to its other types. Diverge only as a sorcery.)[/i]
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may cast spells from the top of your library as long as Self-Experimenter is a Mutant.
